title: Beck Hole Thomason Foss Waterfall Walk Route

images.title: David Marsden / Beck Hole
images.caption: Beck Hole. Looking down to the village from close to the railway bridge. The building immediately behind the two cars, and the land beyond, has been the site of a farm since at least the seventeenth century.

images.title: Thomason Foss by Derek Harper, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Thomason Foss

images.title: The bridge at Beck Hole by Ian S, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: The bridge at Beck Hole

images.title: Chris Gunns / Birch Hall Inn  Beck Hole
images.caption: Birch Hall Inn Beck Hole

images.title: Lis Burke / West Beck gorge
images.caption: West Beck gorge. Not a gentle Sunday afternoon stroll! The gorge is narrow and rocky in places.

description: This walk visits the Thomason Foss and the Mallyan Spout waterfalls from the little village of Beck Hole in North Yorkshire. The walk starts in the village and follows a footpath east along the Eller Beck to Thomason Foss Wood and the falls. The secluded spot is situated next to the line of the North York Moors railway about half a mile east of the village. The route then retraces its steps before turning south to Carr Wood, West Beck and the impressive Mallyan Spout near Goathland. The 70ft high falls are an impressive sight, especially after rainfall. The route then retraces its steps to Beck Hole though you could return via Goathland and turn it into a longer circular walk if you have time.

details.subtitle: Pubs/Cafes
details.content: The Birch Hall Inn is a sweet little pub where you can enjoy some post walk refreshments. They have a lovely garden area overlooking the river. It's a lovely spot to enjoy a sandwich after your exercise. The pub also doubles up as the village shop so you can pick up some extra supplies here too. You'll find them on Beck Hole Road at postcode YO22 5LE for your sat navs.

details.subtitle: Dog Walking
details.content: The woodland trails on the route are ideal for a dog walk. The Birch Hall Inn mentioned above is also dog friendly.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: For more walking ideas in the area see the North York Moors Walks page.

display_address: Beck Hole Road, Beck Hole, Goathland, North Yorkshire, York and North Yorkshire, England, YO22 5LE, United Kingdom
